title: The Attachment Theory
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we discuss Psychoanalyst John Bowlby's Attachment Theory - an attachment behavioral system that guides us in our patterns and habits of forming and maintaining relationships. What factors contribute to your experiences of anxiety, fear, avoidance and/or fulfillment?

Shan Boody's Attachment Style Quiz: https://www.thegameofdesire.com/throne 

Wellness Segment: Fran's new fav book - The Body Keeps The Score https://amzn.to/2HHfG8k

Black Business of the Week: Shaved Ice Shop in Miami https://www.eatsnowsocial.com
